Title: Zunta, The Pet Tamer
Description:
I can tell you have been honing your pet battle skills, $n.  I think it's time for you to take on a real challenge.

Zunta can be found near the Tor'kren Farm south of Orgrimmar.  He is an up and coming wild pet tamer and I think it's time you faced him in battle!
ObjectivesText: Defeat Zunta in a pet battle.
CompletionText: Who be sendin' you to face Zunta?
RewardText: Ah, Varzok. Yes, I know him well. He be makin' no mistake in sendin' you here.
